chefs.name: Yossi Shitrit
chefs.description: Chef Yossi Shitrit has been living and breathing his culinary dreams for more than two decades, including running the kitchen in his first restaurant, the fondly-remembered Violet, located in Moshav  Udim. Shitrit's creativity and culinary  acumen born of long experience  are expressed in the every detail of each and every dish.
